message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a fraction of its true value. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take the risk of selling it to you at this price. What do you say, are you ready to take advantage of this amazing deal?
I appreciate your confidence, but I need to see the true quality before making a decision. Let's move on to the next product.

I understand your concerns, Bob! But let me tell you, this product has some unique features that will still make it valuable to you. And think about it, you're getting it at a steal! The market price for this product is much higher, but I'm willing to make a one-time exception for you. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. Will you reconsider and take a chance on this product?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, given the risk involved and my strategy for this game, I prefer to pass on this opportunity and look for other products. I hope we can find something more suitable for both of us in the future.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I'll be honest with you, I've had some issues with this product myself. But I've worked with the manufacturer to resolve those issues, and I'm confident that it's now a reliable product. I'm willing to offer you a special warranty on this one - if you're not satisfied with its performance, I'll give you a full refund. And, as before, I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you think? Is this a risk you're willing to take?

While the special warranty sounds tempting, I believe it's best for me to continue my search for a product that meets my needs without taking unnecessary risks. Thank you for your offer, Alice. I wish you success with your sales.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make one more offer to you. I've had a change of heart and I'm willing to let you have this product for $8000. That's a significant discount from the original price, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a good deal. Plus, I'll throw in a bonus - I'll give you a free accessory that's worth $500. What do you say? Is this a deal you'd be interested in?

Thank you for adjusting the price and including the bonus accessory, Alice. However, based on my strategy and the information available to me, I've decided to pass on this opportunity. I appreciate your efforts and hope to find a product that better aligns with my needs in the future.

Ah, Bob, I think this is a game-changer! I've got a product that's going to blow your mind. It's one of the best products I've ever had the pleasure of selling, and I think you'll love it. The quality is top-notch, and I'm confident that it will exceed your expectations. And, as a special offer, I'm willing to sell it to you for... $10000. That's right, the same price as before, but this time, you'll be getting a product that's truly exceptional. What do you say, are you ready to take your business to the next level?

I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but based on my strategy and past experiences, I've decided to pass on this opportunity. I'm focused on finding a product that offers the best value for me. Thank you for your offer, and I hope we can collaborate under different circumstances in the future.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I think you're making a mistake. This product is truly exceptional, and I'm not just saying that because I'm trying to sell it to you. I've had other customers who have purchased similar products and they've been thrilled with the results. And, as a special offer, I'm willing to give you a 10% discount on the price. That brings it down to $9000. I think that's a fair price for a product of this quality. What do you say, are you willing to reconsider?

I appreciate your confidence in the product, Alice. After considering the quality and the discount offered, I believe this is a good opportunity for me. Thank you for the special offer, and I look forward to receiving the product and experiencing its quality.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product, Bob! However, I want to caution you that this next product is a bit different.
